testcase.name: 02_Update Personal Information Last Name in My Account
testcase.system-out: Given launch application....................................................passed And verify page title is "My Store".........................................passed Given login to the application using valid "userName" and "password"........passed And verify page title is "My account - My Store"............................passed When navigate to my personal information page...............................passed Then verify page title is "Identity - My Store".............................passed And update "testlastA" in the details section...............................passed Then enter old "password"...................................................passed And Click on save button....................................................passed Then verify "testlastA" got update successfully.............................passed
